Namespace List

Here is a list of all documented namespaces with brief descriptions:
deprecatedThe deprecated namespace contains functionality which is scheduled to be removed in a future version of Thrust
nextThe next namespace contains functionality which is scheduled to be promoted to the top-level thrust namespace in a future version of Thrust
randomrandom is the namespace which contains random number engine class templates, random number engine adaptor class templates, engines with predefined parameters, and random number distribution class templates. They are provided in a separate namespace for import convenience but are also aliased in the top-level thrust namespace for easy access
systemsystem is the namespace which contains classes reporting error conditions originating from the operating system or other low-level application program interfaces such as the CUDA runtime. They are provided in a separate namespace for import convenience but are also aliased in the top-level thrust namespace for easy access
thrustthrust is the top-level namespace which contains all Thrust functions and types
